place_description: Coffee shop providing area-sourced java & pastries in a chill space with local artwork & free Wi-Fi.

reviews_data.review_text: Good coffee and service. Not crowded. Great music. Fair prices.
Awesome coffee shop with a great atmosphere. There are couches, plenty of tables, and board games for hanging out with people.

Absolutely love and adore Mugs in Charlotte, North Carolina! First off, the fact that they are so dogfriendly is phenomenal! I love bringing my two bulldogs in. The service is incredible. Everyone who has served us has been super friendly! The space is cozy and inviting and they play great music! The coffee and snacks menu is also amazing! I love all of their specialty coffees. Everything I've had has been delicious! Can't wait to go back and try something new!

Worst espresso ever, no crema, watery
I'm not sure why but my friends convinced me to give Mugs a second try(they never been there before but it was the only espresso place around) but results were au par with my first review. All 5 espresso had absolutely no cream, very acidic just terrible taste.
Great seating, friendly knowledgeable barista, a real gem of a shop.
Wonderful neighborhood coffee/  Oliver runs a great place, with high quality drinks and a nice staff
One of the best coffee shops in Charlotte. Great vibes, nice staff

I got the combo - an iced coffee, chicken salad croissant, and cookie all for under $10 with a tip! You just don't find that anymore. The person working the counter was so friendly and welcoming and the atmosphere was perfect for what I needed. Easily found a table and outlet. Excellent experience all the way around! It feels great to support a small business.
Amazing coffee and environment but one thing I do find a little disappointing is how they stop serving any type of food an hour before close? I understand 30 minutes before but an hour is excessive!
Very cozy cafe! Barista was welcoming & offered suggestions. Really liked all the seasonal offerings!
Great spot! Very nice drinks, friendly staff and good food options if you come early.

Not only was the coffee delicious, but the service was nothing short of exceptional. Incredibly nice people and excellent amounts of seating.

Came into town for a few weeks and decided to stop by here for a cup of coffee. Ended up making this my hub to work out of when I had meetings.

Highly recommend to anyone who is ever in this part of town. 10/10

Come here for the REAL coffee shop experience. Great place to socialize, study, have a delicious coffee, or to even sit outside to enjoy the sunlight. The staff is super welcoming. The environment is a conducive place for quality study time, social time, or even a game night! I am very thankful for this coffee shop and just hope it continues to stick around long enough to become a Charlotte landmark.
Pretty awesome spot... unfortunately waited til my last month of living in the area to visit!
Very cool space to crack open a laptop and sip a coffee with breakfast. Decent  muffin, nothing special. Fast and very friendly service

Great Hot Tea Assortment !
Good coffees
First time coming here was last night. I got an iced caramel macchiato with soymilk and it was on point! I like supporting local businesses and I love coffee so I will definitely be back.
Tasty and good!
Nice and quiet. Perfect for schoolwork. Excellent coffee and puppers are welcome. Cannot ask for more!
Owned/operated by a really friendly staff. Very welcoming. French press was nice also.
Amazing experience, fantastic coffee. Levels above Starbucks!
Best coffee around
Lovely coffee shop with a charming atmosphere. Very affordable, too!
Very friendly staff, nice atmosphere... Much nicer than Starbucks.
Friendly and knowledgeable Barista. Nice atmosphere and comfortable sitting area! We will be back
One of the best coffee shops I have been to. First time going here and will definitely be back. Friendly service and DELICIOUS coffee. Tried their holiday iced coffees

Sweet coffee and even sweeter staff :^)
My favorite is Sabrina, a real angel!
I love this place. Barista is always very kind. The tea and hot chocolate are great items to try. Plenty of places to park and to sit. Cute couches and decor as well.
Good job.  Keep up the good work and have a nice day too.
Mugs always has the sweetest baristas on staff. They treat me like family here and I love the team so much!
Awesome place to study/work with plenty of room and a relaxed atmosphere.
I got a cold brew. The coffee taste was not yummy & it was really watered down for being a cold brew. The place is cute, clean, people are friendly.
Amazing neighborhood coffee shop!!!

Loved their coffee!  This was a gem to find as I was just looking for a place I can sit, drink coffee (without it being so loud) and write.   Perfect place!  Coffee DELICIOUS!  FOUND BY ACCIDENT,  BUT WHAT A FIND!
Very friendly staff and great coffee.
It was good local coffee shop on the way. Have good selection of beverages menu and panini, cookies, cakes...
Great food and beverage.

Check out this awesome cafe, perfect for board game enthusiasts! It's a unique space where you can team up with others to play a variety of games while enjoying endless coffee. Personally, I absolutely adored their hot chocolate; it had a delightful flavor and was served piping hot. A must-visit spot!

Delicious and very affordable!! I was in need of a coffee shop from which to work - they have free wifi, free refills for tea, comfy chairs, plenty of outlets, good and quiet music, and delicious chicken salad croissants. Absolutely ideal.
Reasonably priced coffee shop, with Great beverages and snacks.
Latte was delicious.
I love Mugs and love to support them whenever I am in Charlotte.
Amazing coffee and service at a local spot. Relaxed environment. I absolutely love it!
Great coffee shop for doing work. Friendly staff, good prices, they have snacks and sandwiches.  I had a pour over and banana muffin. Good beans too!

The vibes inside are so cute! Staff is super friendly and kind, and the price compared to other coffee shops is unbeatable!! Love it here and will definitely come back. They have gluten free options too!!
Stopped by on the recommendation from our daughter, who is a regular @ this friendly & comfortable establishment.  Did an order of ice cold tea's to go! Reasonable prices with tasty beverages.
Amazing place! Very friendly and terrific coffee.
There are several places in Charlotte with great coffee and a great atmosphere. Of all of them, Mugs is my favorite.

Just needed some coffee and found this hidden gem!
The smell of freshly ground coffee hits you as you walk in to find a place that is cozy with a relaxed vibe, friendly and professional barista, great coffee, and I also had a great chocolate chip cookie.
Probably the best coffee I had in the greater Charlotte area!

Good service, coffee was great, prices a little high, there is room to sit, they have super comfy furniture as well as table and chairs for people  who need to do work on laptops, very unique coffee shop, a must place to try. If you don't know what you want to drink baristas will have you!
There are a lot of choices!
Pastries looked super yummy!
One of my favorite coffee shops. It's nothing pretentious and the interior is cozy. It's nothing fancy but it always tastes great. The staff are so nice and welcoming.
Hidden gem, coffee is phenomenal, staff is awesome!!!
Love this place. Coffee is good, atmosphere is laid back and welcoming.
First time going LOVED IT !! Definitely going back

The location is great and the people are very nice but more often than not I don't get my food the way I order it. It seems like after you order they have to go make it from memory which results in me getting sausage when I asked for bacon, a croissant when I asked for a bagel, cheese when I asked for no cheese etc. happened to me 3 out of the last 5 times

Great coffee shop. They always make tasty drinks and the atmosphere is relaxed and familiar. The baristas are always kind and welcoming. Shout out to the young man tidying up the cafe before close. Every times I looked up he was taking care of side work tasks. It's refreshing to see diligent workers.

Mugs Is such a wonderful place to hang.  This has been a social outlet for me.  I have met and have become friends with many.  Oliver Wu the owner has done an amazing job with this establishment.  He hires such friendly people who are quite engaging when time permits. Truly one of the best establishments I have been to.  I love their lattes and muffins .

My husband and I are moving out of the area and one thing we will miss the most is Mugs. My husband and I visit at least once a week and they provide coffee for our church as well. The coffee is priced fairly, but definitely less than surrounding competitors. I routinely drink their house blend or an oat milk cappuccino. The house blend is balanced and lovely to drink as is. The oat milk cappuccinos are always divine and super frothy. We wish we could take Mugs with us, but I definitely recommend stopping by if you're in the Southpark area.
Delicious coffee and their banana bread was also yummy! Will definitely be back again soon
good attitude staff

Super cute ambiance and very nice seating area. Perfect place to sit down and get work done! The people that work here are super nice!
Hot Cocoa: 8/10
Double Chocolate Muffin: 6/10
This is my go to office space and of course the great coffee!

I love Mugs with my whole heart! My boyfriend and I live in the area, and we are at Mugs at least once a week. He often works remotely in the space and he looks forward to being able to do so. The staff is always kind and accommodating! I dream about the coffee I get there. My boyfriend slams the Nitro Cold Brew. This place will always have my loyalty. Best coffee shop in Charlotte. Great product, great atmosphere, zero pretention. I wish I could live here LOL!

I've had a few different coffees and two different teas and everything was very good. The apple cinnamon muffin was surprisingly good! It also had a good vibe; when I had to work from home but not at my actual home, I worked from Mugs and it was pretty ideal.
Cozy atmosphere. Coffee was good. You got the coffee and you can sit down anywhere you  like.

Tried twice - will not be back.  Went in this morning and was "helped" by a kid behind the counter that was more interested in whoever he was texting than to provide much service.  Ordered the Nitro  Cold Brew - absolutely terrible.  It was flat with little taste - I saw him check the tank before serving which was a first clue.  I asked him about it not having the nitro foam you would normally get and he said that's the way they serve it.  Took it to go and ended up throwing about half the drink away.  We try to frequent non commercial chains, although today's visit at Mugs was a mistake that I won't make again.
The friendliest baristas in Charlotte!
Very welcoming and very good coffee. We walled into another cafe down the road and left due to the lack of hospitality and rudeness and very glad we found this place.
Terrific little shop, amazing coffee and probably the best staff I have ever seen.

I lived across the street for just under 4 years and would come here at least once a week as my "take out coffee treat". Any drink I have ordered or that anyone I have brought here ordered has been excellent and their banana nut muffins are delicious.
Best coffee for the best price in CLT.
Super friendly staff and strong coffee. Great smoothies as well.

Lots of syrup in my water ("iced coffee")

The flavor of the syrup didn't even taste like what i asked for...interesting place!
Cool and comfy vibe and good coffee!
Always enjoy this place! They're dog friendly, coffees are great and wifi to work is perfect.  Thank you.
First times a charm. Walked into an amazing atmosphere with a simple menu and friendly staff. What more can you ask for?

Very friendly workers, and a good community vibe for a coffee place, but... they were out of all of their food, and that was some of the worst, most burnt coffee I've had in a while.

If you're gonna be a coffee shop, you've gotta get the coffee right. :/

Mugs used to be one of my favorite local coffee shops to work at or hang out at with my fiance. We've even done some of our wedding planning there. I love the atmosphere and the cozy seating. The coffee is not the best, as other reviews have said, but I don't mind -- I like most coffee.

Unfortunately, I've stopped visiting Mugs even though I live 2 minutes away. The problem is one barista (or friend of the baristas?) who hangs out there in the afternoons and is EXTREMELY LOUD. It's clear that people are there working or doing homework, but she can be heard at every corner of the establishment. I can even hear her when I wear my noise-cancelling earbuds. She chats with the baristas at the bar, cusses excessively, and talks negatively about her friends or her boyfriend. I can't get any work done there because I can't hear my own thoughts. Very sad to have to move on from Mugs.
I love the place. It is great
Great local coffee shop

First time being there. Fantastic coffee shop. A little hidden gem of a place. A Huge Thank You to the barista who explained the sweetness levels of the tea and coffee. Thank you for taking your time to explain. Wonderful staff and great coffee.
Mugs is the go to! Friendly and fast service always.

I've made Mugs my morning office a couple of times a week. I think I've met most of the regulars as well as the occasional dog that walks in and makes itself at home. Oliver always has a full staff of upbeat baristas. It's the perfect place for a quick business meeting or casual get together. You should give Mugs a try.
Visited for an evening board game event. Was a very nice shop with a very welcoming atmosphere.

Baristas not wearing masks. I'm only taking 1 star off because of that.
Fingers crossed y'all.

My family and especially my husband, frequent Mugs coffee.  The coffee, hot chocolate, and breakfast sandwiches are always fantastic.  The atmosphere is warm and inviting and the staff are friendly and treat us like family.
Best place for coffee , conversation   studying or work.
I go to mugs a few times a week and absolutely love it.
My absolute favorite local shop! Cute place, great vibes and even better drinks!
Met a friend there. Will definitely be back!
Oliver & Co. are the best, glad to have found my neighborhood coffee shop
Clean, friendly work environment with great coffee, atmosphere, and pastries.
Excellent coffee, great service, super friendly.
Mugs is a staple, simple coffee shop with fantastic service.
Mugs is one of my favorite coffee shops in Charlotte! It is cozy and the drinks are so tasty, creative, and unique combinations. Keep doing you Mugs!
Great space for conversation or working .  Great coffee too.  Barista is the bomb!!

Mugs is a great coffee house! The coffee was smooth and rich. What I really love about this coffee shop is that they don't kill you with way to much sugar. My coffee was literally perfect with a real coffee flavor, not dressed up in so much syrup that you can't taste the actual coffee. Definitely a favorite place for a cup and some art.
Really great drinks, and super nice staff! I'll definitely be back
It's a cute and cozy place. Good for on the go breakfasts with coffee. Nice place to work and have small meetings.

I was craving a French press on my way to the airport so decided to stop in . The staff was kind  but tried to pass me off a brewed coffee after a substantial wait . After, I over heard them talking about how to make a French press (Red flag). Instead of immediately rectification of my order, the barista continued with other orders while I waited . The wait wasn't the issue , it was the final product . The French press lacked body and I felt like I was drinking a cup of hot water.
For the coffee enthusiast I definitely DO NOT recommend.
Great coffee, excellent selection

Coffee? Good. Breakfast? Good. Dog friendly? GREAT!! Even though I take my service dog with me everywhere, it's still nice to know that she's actually welcomed by friendly people. Super spacious and I love their hours, very convenient.

I discovered a new drink today and it was made perfectly by the nicest staff.  Affogato, it was amazing!  Plans to go back tomorrow for another fix....I have found my new place and new drink outside of my dark roast @ other locations.  I am very particular  when it comes to my coffee, from a woman whose husband wakes me with my first cup every mornings.
Cute place!
Usually full but there is a reason.
Love the coffee!
I actually went there for a beer. It is a great place to be low key.
My fav coffee shop in all of Charlotte! This is the best place to study.
My best coffee stop till date. A great place to sit and enjoy your coffee along with reading. Staff is really nice and entertaining.
Really good coffee shop. The prices are great for coffee and food and the coffee is delicious. The atmosphere is warm and friendly, it's a good place to read, write, or relax.
Been coming here for years, good local spot, well priced coffee, Oliver is always a tremendously interesting guy to talk to. All the baristas make great coffee, but Cora's the best.
Very comfortable atmosphere, yummy food and excellent service
Great coffee and some pretty good snacks. Friendly staff, always helpful!!

Great coffee great staff. The business is people and dog friendly. The wait is never very long and they have plenty of space both in doors and out to sit and relax. An excellent spot for your morning coffee and a nice destination for a weekend morning walk with the family.
Underrated in every aspect!

This was a cool little coffee shop not too far from where I went for a work meeting. The vibe definitely struck me as a lot of regulars that kind of hang out here all of the time. Everybody seemed kind of at home and were in plenty of conversation so it wasn't like a super quiet awkward scene when you walk in. The coffee was solid. I would stop in again if I'm in town again.
Wonderful experience! Kind & knowledgeable barista with a lovely dash of humor.

Lauren was the best!!!! She took care of my daughter, Avery, and I.  We had to sit at the bar due to no other seats available, but I'm so glad we did. Lauren was great to chat with and made such a killer drink, I had to get a second. Love this quaint local coffee shop.
Terrific selection.  Excellent customer service.  Wonderful atmosphere.  Overall, great place that I will definitely be going back to!
Great place to get coffee!
Nice cozy good chill coffee shop with very good lattes
Such a great local coffee spot. Check it out!

Mugs has a fantastic staff and good coffee.  I meet with friends and colleagues here regularly to catch up, socialize, and conduct some minor business.  It's become one of my favorite spots in Charlotte.

The silhouette in each restroom always gives newcomers a bit of a start the first time they use the facilities, which is one of the more fun quirky aspects of this little shop.
Very chill coffee shop, good for studying or hanging out.
My favorite neighborhood coffee shop. Good coffee: usually Magnolia and Enderly beans. Good service. Plenty of space.
Amanda was great very accommodating!!! Very awesome experience

Use to frequent Mugs over ten years ago when it first opened for its comfortable atmosphere and quality drinks, stoped in recently while visiting Charlotte and feel it has gotten even better. The coffee at Mugs is delicious.
The staff is so kind and the coffee comes out pretty fast while not sacrificing quality. Great coffee, great people.

Mugs is an amazing place to just sit and get a cup of coffee. I had the fireside latte and it was delicious. It gets a bit crowded in the morning so I reccomend coming in the evening. The staff are all very friendly. Very cool place!
Always wonderful!

Oliver and his staff are so warm and welcoming! He remembered my beverage of choice after only a few visits and often asks how work is going. They practice a clean/safe environment and correct social distancing practices. They also support local artists and photographers by having their pieces displayed on the walls (that are for sale). Just another great reason to support this local establishment!

I ordered a medium hot chocolate and it was amazing. It wasn't too hot and it wasn't to cold.  The person who took my order and made the medium hot chocolate was nice as well. Would recommend going here if you enjoy hot chocolate. They also have other items as well.
Muy muy delicioso

Decent place to casually hang out or work on assignments, lots of seating and outlets for chargers. Coffee was good, pastries are okay. Two stars due to the immaturity and PDA of the baristas. One of them had their boyfriend behind the counter making out while my wife and I were only several feet away trying to complete our work. We had to leave due to the awkwardness and how loud they were.
I love the small little coffee House restaurant.
Love this place. Great latte and work space. Friendly staff.
Good coffee place for a sit down although as for the coffee itself, I thought Caribou was more flavorful. Not too bad though. Will go back again
Friendly staff, tasty drinks, fun atmosphere.
Was for my sisters and me our first time here and the attention was excellent,rather too agile and fast the service even with only one person.
Nice place.  I really enjoyed the Chai Tea
A great quiet place to read and write with internet and PLENTY of power outlets, LoL.

The experience was great at first until the baristas' boyfriends came in. Too much immaturity and PDA for our tastes. They're behind the counter making out while my wife and I are trying to complete work not far away. The employees and their boyfriends were way too loud and we finally had to leave after the cursing got worse and the topics were inappropriate. This is our first and last visit because of the baristas.
Friendly staff and great coffee. Prices were good and the selection was decent.

My husband and I came here with our friend this weekend. Place was super busy. We had the pleasure of dealing with Neha! She was spectacular and handles this place like a boss! With the crazy line, she managed to handle our order with accuracy and hold a very pleasant conversation! Even with the busy line, she kept a smile on her face. The coffee and food was great, but she is definitely one of the reasons we will be coming back!

Such great coffee and service! Neha is always amazing and her makeup is on point! Also, the whole place is cozy and very welcoming. There are books and games for customers to enjoy. Be sure to stop by!!

Me and my friends stopped by on a Sunday and the atmosphere is super cute and cozy! The drinks and food are great! The best part of the experience was Neha! Neha was so kind and working so hard as she held down the fort by herself for a bit! I loved chatting with her and she truly cares about her customers and definitely lights up the room with her energy!
Definitely coming back next time I'm in town and will stop by to say hi to Neha!
Great coffee shop with local feel. Super nice staff and cozy feel. Food options aren't the absolute best but you go for the coffee and supporting a local business.

Neighborhood spot, lots of tables and places to sit to meet. It looks like they have some local artist work displayed which is traditional of a coffee shop. I got a dirty chai with oat milk. I wish I would have gotten a regular coffee. I think that if you like black coffee or if you like to order the daily roast and dress it yourself, then mugs is the place. Would not recommend to any Coffee connoisseurs as you will be mostly disappointed.
Wonderful little shop
Sweet little coffee shop. They have great non-dairy and GF options - love the latte with coconut milk and the GF muffins!

Wish i could find a coffee shop this good in my city.  Really nice staff (all of them).  Clean place, good food, good coffee, they have cinnamon toast crunch, love the decor too.  Also the music is good too.  What else do you want in a coffee shop?
Great coffee and pastries!
Great coffee shop! Friendly employees and we love the owner. He's brought coffee to Church at Charlotte/ New City Church for years. Great tasting coffee too!
Great service and amazing iced coffee! Reasonably priced.

So I drove from one side to the next to get there  so yes its great! But I came and they said they couldn't serve me because the manager said if it's not profitable to stay open then they close up shop up early. And I totally get that but I felt like that was a big waste of time for me. So you guys if you try to get coffee  around 730pm and they close at 9pm please call ahead.

I stopped by to attend this writers club I discovered online. It wasn't as great of a turn out as I expected--only one other person showed up--but I enjoyed it nonetheless. Anywho, I really liked the atmosphere of the shop. The music was pleasant, the seating was comfortable, and I appreciated that there was a shelf with free books to pick from. Oh, and Crystal (I think that's her name) made me some really good black tea, so that's a major plus. I'll definitely be returning!
Mugs is a perfect place to grab a drink and enjoy some quiet time!
Been going there since Oliver opened the doors.  Fantastic coffee, great staff, perfect atmosphere!  Dog friendly too.  Great group of community patrons who are so friendly!!!
Great coffee, nice environment to enjoy it with fantastic eats.

Great environment, amazing baristas, and excellent quality of serving at one of the best areas in Charlotte.

Edit: I gave this place 5 stars previously and was one of my favorite places. I was super frustrated to see how they're operating during the coronavirus, even after mask is made mandatory. None of the patrons was wearing mask and to my utter surprise none of the employees too. Today was definitely my last visit.

Mugs is the best! I've worked from home for two years and Mugs is my go-to spot for great coffee, reliable internet, and comfy seats.

You'll find the owner, Oliver, behind the counter almost everyday of the week and the customer service is beyond expectation. It's just not an experience you get at Starbucks, Mugs is really one of a kind!

Super cute, cozy and cute space. I believe they attract board-gamers / other groups if that's your hobby. Some days the iced coffee is yummy, others it tastes like watered down hot coffee but I guess it depends who is making it.
Best coffee in Charlotte! I wish there was more locations!
I really liked it here. Good vibes.
The coffee is really good. The service is fast and friendly. It's a great local coffee shop all around.
It is a quiet place to study in.
First coffee cafe I've visited since moving here 4weeks ago & the guy at the counter was absolutely rude! Maybe he was having a bad day, but I won't be back.
Love this place! Great coffee & service!
Ordered decaf coffee this evening which was clearly caffeinated by my lack of ability to sleep.
Great atmosphere! Good selections but most importantly - GOOD HOT CAFE....
Great coffee / tea. Best Service.

Quick service. Great coffee. Reasonably priced compared to the mermaid chain. Ordered a salted caramel drip w cream (which is pretty much what I get at the other place).  If it were closer, I could be a regular customer.
This was our first time here and it was a nice environment. Very homely and nice staff
Meetup game night was a blast

Always a great experience here at Mugs.
Oliver takes great care of his customers. Staff is equally friendly and helpful.
Solid selection of morning beverage fare as well as eats and oh by the way, they have a few beer selections of you want to sit and relax in an easy going atmosphere,,,, this is the spot on Park Road.
Good coffee, super friendly staff, cozy atmosphere. Planning to come to an open mic night and gaming group in the future.
Poor quality coffee.  Overextracted, burnt and weak.
Good coffee, smoothie and tea options.  Pastries, cards, no sandwiches.

Mugs was great! Writers from the Charlotte Writers Club read their work there Friday night.
I got an espresso shake. It was delish.
Great coffee and great customer service.
Good service and good product.

Staff was friendly, atmosphere and music chill and perfect for getting some work done, fast WiFi and plenty of outlets. One free refill on the coffee a plus! Also had a little cold water jug. Dog-friendly is awesome, I don't personally have dogs to bring but I love them so I was happy to see them in there :). As a remote worker I will definitely come back to grab a coffee and work a little!
Absolute favorite coffee shop in Charlotte! Every-Day-Visit
Best owner of Indie coffee shop in Charlotte! Cheers and yeS, best coffee and prices!

Great coffee shop! I ordered the Chai iced latte and it was delicious. They offer beer now, too. Tall boys from NoDa brewing for flat $5. Nice open space with plenty of seating! Saw the cutest French bulldog inside so they're pet friendly, too.

Absolutely loved this place! The service was great and the coffee was delicious! Always down to support local great spots. WiFi was fast and it's a great environment to get some work done or meet a friend. I will definitely be coming back.
This is a large ice coffee with sugar free salted Carmel and a bit of half and half. ( pricing is incredible compared to Starbucks)
Mugs is the best! The coziest coffee shop in Charlotte in my opinion. So easy to spend hours getting work done in a great environment.

Nice ambience and good space to get some work done. I got the sweetened iced tea which was quite good.

Bathroom was clean too with a pleasant surprise in store for first time visitors.
Reasonable prices for a coffee shop, nostalgic decor, great polite cashier. My coffee was great. I'd go again.
Great coffee and beverage specials
Love it!
Me

Good coffee with a nice selection of flavored syrups to jazz up your java. They have a selection of lattes and other concoctions as well. I had the most ahhhhhmazing gluten free coconut muffin! Very inviting and comfortable atmosphere.
Love this place
not bad at all. Nice fresh muffins.
One of my go to coffee spots when I up in the South Park area

Great coffee and food. Friendly and fantastic service, and locally owned.
What more could you want  !
Delicious Coffee
there was fast and courteous service.
My go to Charlotte coffee shop
Great local coffee hangout. Delicious espresso and chai. I think they can make you whatever you like.
Great place to get work done while sipping on some great quality coffee. It is typically pretty quiet, however sometimes it's hard to find a table because there aren't many seats.
I always get a capuchino and breakfast. Love it. Wonderful staff and selection.
Good coffee, good atmosphere, this is the coffee shop you are looking for.
I love the atmosphere and of course the coffee is yummy too :) the staff is very friendly and welcoming !!
Always a great spot for coffee or tea.
Wonderful coffee shop that enjoys being local

Mugs is such a fun spot. When I walk in, it feels like stepping onto the set of a cool, early 2000's movie, with its rich warm color scheme, chalkboard menu signs, collection of fun knick knacks, and a constant, eclectic crowd of customers. It's a great shop to sit alone and catch up on some work in the company of strangers or to hang out with a group of friends. The staff is always super friendly and the drink menu is pretty extensive. You can get your favorite hot or cold drink in any flavor and they have a good selection of milk alternatives.
Love Mugs! The coffee is always good. The atmosphere is relaxed. And it feels like a local business with its own personality.
Love their coffee when we are in that area of Charlotte
Great local place

Good coffee, pleasant staff and good food for a coffee shop. I try to avoid going to Starbucks as much as possible, so I am always on the hunt for a convenient place to get a cup of coffee, work or meet colleagues and potentially get a bite to eat, and this coffee shop checks all of those boxes.

I tried this location since it is centrally located between downtown and a number of other areas in Charlotte, so I am able to meet people from other areas of the city here without either of us having to drive too far (I am centrally located just outside of uptown).

The coffee is significantly better than what you might find at a Starbucks (though I do go to Starbucks as well when I have to). The staff is always very friendly and they will even take the time to educate you on things you might want to know when purchasing an item. For example, every time I purchase a coffee, they let me know that I can get one complimentary refill included in a purchase. While some coffee shops may do this, most won't proactively let you know since I assume they are trying to keep costs low.

For someone who loves coffee, this makes me more apt to purchase a larger size, knowing I will at least get my money's worth, especially considering the quality and taste of the coffee here is superior to other places I've tried.

I have also ordered food here while working and it is surprisingly good, especially for a coffee shop. They serve fresh croissants with chicken salad in it, which was very well done. The chicken salad was fresh (not frozen) and the croissant was well-made...crispy and flaky with a soft warm center.  Whenever I eat at Starbucks (which is extremely rare, mainly only in airports when I have limited time to get food and coffee), they warm up the spinach feta wrap from what was clearly made a while ago and is probably filled with numerous preservatives. Though it tastes okay, it is not something I would crave, while the chicken salad sandwich at Mugs is actually worth going back for.

Overall, I would recommend this place to someone who is looking for an alternative to Starbucks with better coffee, better food, good service and a comfortably working or meeting environment.
Nice little coffee shop with lots of seating.  They have couch areas for gatherings and some board games.  I think I might have an event here.
Great coffee and nice place to relax and sip away!
Great cup of coffee and friendly environment! Short and simple yet delicious breakfast menu.
Great neighborhood coffee shop! Fast, friendly service!
Very homie atmosphere.  Feels like you are in your own living room enjoying your beverage.
Good spot for great conversation, and coffee!
Cozy and great place to meet up with friends.  Staff was very nice.
Great place for coffee and a quick bite.
The atmosphere is spot on and the barristas are always super nice and fun to speak with. Thanks a lot!
I really like barista Michael. He's so friendly and so cute. Yum yum.
Coffee is too expensive. Internet speeds were slow.
Comfortable and cozy.  Friendly staff and quick service. Great coffee and baked good.
Great place for a cup of Joe. Drinks are good and plenty of space to relax or work.
Great service, great atmosphere....and great coffee!
Great place, next time I will be in town I will definitely visit it again. I liked coffee and they have unsweetened almond milk
Love this place! The coffee is really good and the atmosphere is very relaxing. Nice place to meet friends
Great food, coffees and atmosphere at a great price!
Very cute place in a great location!
Good and cozy coffee spot with great service
Great atmosphere for a hole in the wall appearance gave it a safe and relaxing tone with interesting artwork....
Great coffee and great service. Super cozy place to work, too, with plenty of couches and chairs.
Loved this coffee shop, great atmosphere, food and drinks were very good and the service was friendly.
Amazing! The service is wonderful and the food/drinks made to perfection!
Decent prices.okay coffee
Cool place, friendly service, good coffee.
Coffee was ok

Unlike any coffee house I have ever frequented ! it was similar to stepping into a library, definitely not a place to socialize/chit-chat, you will receive some strange looks for talking, and the  coffee was below par; we won't be returning. ALSO, unlike Sonia Perez (below review) I like old people, they made this country and she should respect and remember that !
Good coffee shakes.

This is my favorite local coffee shop. They support local artists and They do weekly events too.. just check their calendar. I've been to many coffee shops in NYC, Europe, and Middle East. And by far this is the most comfortable and the only one that makes the best coffee shakes. You can have a delicious coffee with a light snack in such a cozy place! It's a coffee Heven! The owner is a great guy and the baristas are so friendly. This place make you feel at home! Even their customers are friendly and chatty. I've been a regular customer for 5 years. I would definitely visit again when I come to the US. I miss this place and I miss their caramel coffee shake
I like atmosphere.   Great coffee.

Cozy with eclectic feel. Feels like relaxing ina living room rather than a coffee shop. Hidden oasis that is unassuming in a strip mall close to the Portofino's and the HT. Good coffee and friendly service. 5 stars and 2 thumbs up !
Mugs is my favorite coffee shop in Charlotte! Everyone who works there is so kind and friendly, and the atmosphere is great for working or visiting with friends. And the coffee is so good!
Great chai!

The absolute BEST coffee shop in Charlotte!
Mugs is a friendly neighborhood atmosphere with excellent coffee and a top notch staff.
Nice chill vibe. Only coffee shop I've visited that serves beer, too.

Mugs is my home, office, and space to unwind. It's usually fairly busy, but never TOO busy to be distracting. The menu and drinks are pretty standard in terms of what's offered, but they're a notch above what you'd get at your local Starbucks, etc. when it comes to quality. Price and service and good across the board.

If you're looking for a coffee shop where everyone behind the counter knows your name, or you're simply in need of a place to be productive away from your home and office, Mugs won't let you down.
One of the best cups of coffee I've had in town
Awesome spot to hangout on Saturday morning
